list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update site content and styling for improved UX
Replaced custom CSS with TailwindCSS for streamlined styling and responsive layout. Enhanced content structure with clearer CTAs, an embedded demo video, and updated feature descriptions for better clarity and engagement. Adjusted form and layout elements for improved accessibility and visual hierarchy.

task.summary:
Add Google Tag Manager to index.html
Integrated Google Tag Manager (GTM) scripts into index.html for tracking and analytics. Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` with minor IDE configuration changes likely related to project metadata and preferences.

"Relocate Google Tag Manager (noscript) to top of body tag
Moved the Google Tag Manager (noscript) snippet from the bottom to the top of the body tag for improved implementation consistency. This ensures the script loads as early as possible, adhering to best practices."

Add success message for subscription form submission
A hidden success message is added to the page to notify users after joining the mailing list. It improves user feedback and confirms the form's functionality. The message is styled to appear green and remain hidden until triggered.

Update metadata and site title for B2B launch
Revised the title, meta descriptions, and Open Graph tags to reflect the new focus on B2B Demand Generation Strategy. Updated URLs and alt texts to align with the rebranding efforts for better SEO and consistency. Minor adjustments made to success message wording.

Update site content and UX for improved clarity and engagement
Enhanced metadata, headlines, and descriptions to align with new branding and SEO goals. Introduced clear CTAs, an embedded demo video, and detailed feature descriptions for better user understanding. Made layout and styling adjustments for improved alignment and visual hierarchy.

Update site content and styling for improved UX
Replaced custom CSS with TailwindCSS for streamlined styling and responsive layout. Enhanced content structure with clearer CTAs, an embedded demo video, and updated feature descriptions for better clarity and engagement. Adjusted form and layout elements for improved accessibility and visual hierarchy.
